WorkItem.ClosedComment: See the help pages on the optimizer before posting issues like this... you have to mark the gems available
WorkItem.Description: I tried to run an optimization for my tree druid, and found that none of the epic gems were recognized.  I use runed cardinal rubies, luminous ametrines, and purified dreadstones.  It ranked blue items above my ilvl 323 conqueror's leggings because the gems weren't recognized.
